data.text: Titia moi dikhise singhason te bohi kene thaka Isor laga dyna hathte kitab ase, juntu te age aru pichete bhi likhi kene thakise, aru sat-ta chihna pora mari kene thakise.
Aru moi dikhise ekjon mohan sorgodoth dangor awaj pora koi thakise, “Kun etu kitab laga chihna to bhangi bole nimite yogya ase?”
Kintu kunbi sorgo aru prithibi aru prithibi laga nichete etu kitab khuli kene puribole para nai.
Titia moi bisi mon dukh kori kene kandise kelemane etu khuli kene puri bo nimite kun manu bhi thaka nai.

Kintu ekjon bura manu moike koise, “Tumi nakandibi. Sabi! Judah jat laga Bagh, David laga Jor, Tai he etu sob to jiti loise. Tai he etu kitab to khuli bole pare aru ta te lagai kene thaka sat-ta chihna Tai he khuli bole pare5.5 Gen. 49:9; Isa. 11:1, 10..”

Titia moi ekta Mer laga bacha ke dikhise, jun singhason laga majot khara hoi kene thakise aru charta janwar khan majot khara thakise aru bura manu khan majote khara thakise, Taike morai diya nisena dikhise. Tai laga sat-ta seing aru sat-ta suku thakise, juntu Isor laga sat-ta atma khan thakise, kunkhan ke prithibi laga sob jagate pathai dise5.6 Zec. 4:10..
Tai jai kene singhason te bohi thaka ekjon laga dyna hath pora etu kitab loise.

Jitia Tai etu kitab loise, charta jinda thaka janwar aru choubees bura manu Mer laga bacha usorte athukari jaise. Taikhan logote nijor laga veena aru suna laga bati te joli kene mitha sugandh thaka pora bhorta hoi kene thaka dikhise, eitu khan to pobitro manu khan laga prathana khan thakise.
Apuni taikhan ke ekta rajyo aru Apuni ke shewa kori bole nimite purohit bonai dise,
Titia moi saise aru bisi sorgodoth laga awaj hunise taikhan etu singhason usorte thakise aru jinda thaka janwar aru bura manu khan, sob mili kene dos hajar aru hajar-hajar thakise5.11 Dan. 7:10..
Titia moi hunise sob bonai diya saman jun to sorgo aru prithibi te thakise, aru prithibi laga bhitor te thakise, aru samundar te aru kiman saman ta te thakise, taikhan koi thakise,
Aru charta jinda thaka janwar para koise, “Amen!” Aru titia cholawta khan athukari kene Taike aradhana korise.
